name: Tayong's Story
description:
Game Description

 Tayong’s Story places the player in the shoes of Tayong, a boy living in the streets of Manila. They must find the necessary items for Tayong’s survival for each day and for him finally live a stable life. In their venture around Manila, they meet a motley crew of people who will help or hinder Tayong’s chance of having a stable life

Genre

Tayong’s Story is a hidden object adventure game where the player must find the required items and traverse Manila to see a story unfold.

Team

The team behind Tayongs Story:
Bianca San Luis - Designer, Artist
Gino Diccion - Programmer
Bernard Vallero - Artist
